question:
Which among the following pairs of mountain ranges and their peaks is/are correctly matched?
  1. Arakan Yoma - Mt. Kennedy
  2. Kunlun Mountains - Mt. Muztag
  3. Vosges - Mt. Grand Ballon
Select the correct code from the options given below:
explanation:
The Arakan Yoma Mountain range in Myanmar extends from north to south direction. Here shifting cultivation is a common practice. Mt. Kennedy is the highest peak in the Arakan Yoma Mountain range.

The Kunlun Mountains are located in the North of the Tibetan plateau and western China. It is one of the young folded mountains. Mt. Muztag is the highest peak in the Kunlun mountains.

The Vosges mountain range is located in the Eastern France, Europe. Mt. Grand Ballon is the highest peak in the Vosges. The Vosges mountain range is famous for cultivation of grapes and manufacture of wines.
